article.Heading: Budget 2017: Government will allocate Rs10,000 crore for Bharat Net project
article.Summary: The FM also said that high speed broadband will be available in more 150,000 gram panchayats via WiFi hotspots by end of next financial year.
article.Body:
Swaraj Baggonkar
Moneycontrol

Finance Minister Arun Jaitley said that the government will allocate Rs 10,000 crore for Bharat Net project in the coming financial year.

The FM also said that high speed broadband will be available in more 150,000 gram panchayats via WiFi hotspots by end of next financial year.

Jaitley also noted that last year's spectrum auctions have now removed spectrum scarcity in the country.
